items.title: Starmer backs down in farm tax row - but why now?
items.description: A U-turn on inheritance tax plans for farmers raises more questions about political judgement in government.

items.title: BP sells stake in motor oil arm Castrol for $6bn
items.description: BP has sold a 65% stake in its motor lubricant arm Castrol to US-based investment firm Stonepeak.

items.title: Zelensky moves towards demilitarised zones in latest peace plan for Ukraine
items.description: On the key question of Ukraine's eastern Donbas, Zelensky says a "free economic zone" is a potential option.

items.title: Does religion have a role to play in sport?
items.description: Athletes and footballers tell us if talking about their faith impacts how they are treated in sport.

items.title: Venezuela accuses US of 'extortion' over seizure of oil tankers
items.description: An emergency meeting of the UN Security Council was called to discuss the US seizure of two tankers.
